name: 楊安石
objective: 本課程主要目標為將數學方法應用在工程問題，課程內容有常微分方程，線性代數，向量微積分，及偏微分方程式等之簡介，訓練同學數學應用於工程計算及研究。內容包括數值方法，機率理論及數學機率等。
schedule:
1) Reviews;Basic Concepts and Ideas; Geometrical Meaning of y’=f(x, y);Separable Differential Eq
2) Modeling: Separable Eq.;Homogenous Linear Eq. of 2nd  Order with Constant Coefficients; Euler-Cauchy Eq.;
3) Non-homogenous Equations; Solution by Undetermined Coefficients
4) Higher Order Homogenous Linear Eq. with Constant Coefficients;
Nonhomogeous Linear ODEs
5) Power Series Method; Theory of the Power Series Method
6) 第一次期中考; Legendre’s Equation; Legendre Polynomials Pn(x)
7) Laplace Transform; Transformations of Derivatives and Integrals Diff. Eq
8) Unit Step Function; Differentiation and Integration of Laplace Transforms; Convolution. Integral Eq.
9) 期中考
10) Matrices, Vectors, Matrix Multiplication;Linear Systems of Eqs.; Gauss Elimination;Rank of a Matrix; Linear Independence; Vector Space
11) 第二次期中考; Solutions of Linear System; Determinants; Cramer’s Rule; Inverse of a Matrix
12) Eigenvalues, Eigenvectors; Some Applications of Eigenvalue Problems; Symmetric, Skew-Symmetric, and Orthogonal Matrices
13) Curves; Tangents, Arc Length; Inner & Vector Product; Gradient of a Scalar Field; Directional Derivative; Divergence of a Vector Field; Curl of a Vector Field
14) Line Integrals; Vector and Scalar Functions and Fields; Derivatives; Double Integrals; Surface Integrals
15) Triple Integrals; Divergence Theorem of Gauss; Fourier Series; Functions of Any Period p=2L
16) Even and Odd Functions; Fourier Integrals & Fourier Transform
17) Basic Concepts of PDE; Separation of Variables; Similarity Methods
18) 期末考
scorePolicy:
1) 兩次期中考與期末考
2) 擇優兩次定為期中成績50%、期末成績50%
materials:
Advanced Engineering Mathematics (9th Edition, John Wiley)
Authors: Erwin Kreyszig
